thread.title: Mrs J H Bygrave
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs J H Bygrave

author: Mrs J H Bygrave
title: Mrs J H Bygrave
text:
From start to finish I received excellent service.
Ordering was easy and I was kept informed throughout the process.
The blind was superb quality and very well made when it arrived, well packaged.
Installation was so simple.
Thanks for a brilliant service and I will definitely return to buy from you when I need a new blind.
